rules_text:
Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Shipment Overseer.
Surpass {5}{R} [i]({5}{R}: Transform this creature. This costs {1} less to activate for each counter on it. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
rules_text2: Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, Overseer of Armies deals 1 damage to each opponent and each battle they protect.
